name: The Free Ones
description: Follow Theo's dizzying adventure in first-person platformer "The Free Ones". Soar through the air with your grapple, blaze a trail through the canyons and take part in an extraordinary story.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD6970, Nvidia GT 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
